origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'EnergyMarketAPI.analyze_market', 'description': 'This function analyzes the current state of the global energy market, focusing on supply and demand dynamics as well as geopolitical risks.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'focus', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The specific aspect of the market to analyze, e.g., supply_demand_geopolitical, pricing_trends.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysisReport', 'description': 'A detailed report on the specified focus area of the energy market.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 EnergyMarketAPI.analyze_market, 它的参数输入如下: 'focus'是'supply_demand_geopolitical'.
